function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Members not pre-booking on the digital calendar","Impact":"Increased risk of overcrowding and difficulty in contact tracing","Mitigation":"Enforce pre-booking policy and implement contact tracing measures","Technologies":"Digital calendar booking system, contact tracing software","People":"Members, administrative staff","Owner":"Administrative staff"},{"Description":"Masks being taken off during group sessions","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission","Mitigation":"Enforce continuous mask-wearing policy during group sessions","Technologies":"Monitoring systems, staff supervision","People":"Members, administrative staff","Owner":"Administrative staff"},{"Description":"Limited number of interactions between members allowed","Impact":"Reduced social interaction and support among members","Mitigation":"Implement virtual social interaction platforms and support systems","Technologies":"Online communication tools, virtual support platforms","People":"Members, administrative staff","Owner":"Administrative staff"}]}
